item.title: Orchestrating A Successful Enterprise AI Transformation
item.description: I originally wrote this article for the APAC CIO Outlook magazine -> link here. Photo by Charlie Solorzano on Unsplash The AI revolution is well and truly underway. An article by the Financial Times reveals that the number of AI-related patent applications globally increased from 18,995 in 2013 to 55,660 in 2017 (as per analysis by Geneva-based Wipo). This means that over 50% of the entirety of AI patents have been generated in the last 5 years!
